directions: Using a toothpick, spear a half of a tomato, a leaf of basil, a mozzarella ball, and another half of a tomato.  Repeat with remaining ingredients.
Place on a serving dish and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Mix the vinegar and oil together in a small bowl to serve as a dipping sauce.
ingredients: 20 small balls fresh mozzarella cheese (often labeled bocconcini)
title: Tomato and Mozzarella Bites
